body.name: Fila Men's Memory Workshift-m Shoes
features: SOLID PERFORMANCE: Durable leather and synthetic overlays to meet your occupational needs

SUPERIOR TRACTION: Solid rubber slip resistant outsole - tested in accordance with the applicable industry standards, including: ASTM F2913-11; though designed to help prevent slips, you should always exercise caution on slick surfaces
ALL DAY COMFORT: Memory foam sockliner and midsole for additional comfort
RELAXED STYLING: Perforations for breathability and a lace up front closure for relaxed fit
body.description: Feel comfortable without sacrificing performance and protection in your work day with the Fila Memory Workshift slip resistant safety shoe. Where premium meets utility, the Memory Workshift is constructed from durable leather and synthetic overlays to give you a dependable work shoe that meets your occupational needs. Our Fila Memory Workshift shoe features a rubber slip resistant outsole to provide traction against slick or wet surfaces – tested in accordance with the applicable industry standards, including: ASTM F2913-11. Though designed to help prevent slips, you should always exercise caution on slick surfaces. The memory foam sockliner and midsole work in unison to provide additional comfort with every step of your day. Face your daily challenges with ease and support with built in perforations for breathability and a variable lace up front closure. Our work shoes are designed to fulfill work in every industry. From healthcare to restaurant, to construction and industrial - when the work day gets long, Fila is there with a shoe that defies expectations to deliver another level of performance and quality design. Fila began in 1911, in the small alpine town of Biella, Italy, a place renowned for manufacturing the world's finest textiles, and weaving fabrics with impeccable quality, true innovation and extraordinary beauty. Born of the city and its traditions, Fila is inexorably derived from Biella's dedication to artistry, luxury and elegance. This is our birthright, it's in our soul, and it defines our future. We continue to enrich the athletic experience by improving comfort and performance with Italian design, quality craftsmanship and refined materials. There is no feeling quite as luxurious as that of playing in Fila, and that is the reason for our existence. We create what is desired, not what is necessary. Not just enough, but more than you need. This is Fila.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Trusty Work Shoe I Hope They Never Discontinue
reviews.reviewText: As a tall woman who needs a 12 or 13 in shoes, it is HARD finding shoes that meet the specs I need for work (black, non-slip, wipe-clean, no soft or mesh uppers....) that also actually fit and are tolerable comfort-wise. I've lost track of how many pairs I've sent back because the sizing was way off or because they were as comfortable as strapping bricks to my feet.I bought a pair of these last year (Workshift-m, 10.5 M US) and FINALLY, a work shoe that works for me! I wish I could afford to order a dozen pairs in case they ever discontinue them.I had tried them in 10.5 4E Wide but those weren't proportioned right for my feet so had to return them as they were seriously uncomfortable. The regular 10.5 M size is just right though. The fit is good and with my own gel-insoles inserted, the comfort level is just fine, too. Just as important, I have never lost my footing in these so the non-slip soles are reliable. I ordered my last pair in Aug 2022 and even with wearing 8 hrs a day, 5 days a week, it's taken 'til now, a year and a half later, for them finally to be showing enough wear that they need to be replaced. I just ordered my second pair last week and the fit & comfort level hasn't changed so the $20 price increase was worth it. Very happy not to have to deal with searching for, ordering, and returning a bunch of pairs from other brands to find something that'll work. Thumbs-up to these Filas, please don't ever discontinue this style

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great walking shoe that doubles as a dress shoe
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable shoes that can be worn for dress shoes they fit to the standard sizing so whatever size you normally get should work at least they did for me. They also last have been wearing mine for about 3 months and they still look good I wear them daily for work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cushioned shoes with anti-slip soles for indoors.
reviews.reviewText: These were the first FILA shoes I've tried. They are priced lower than most other brands. They are very comfy, with memory foam insoles and all around cushy feel. They are aimed at indoor workers, especially food prep folks, and emphasize their non-slip soles. The sole pattern is finely divided and may tend to track in mud if used outdoors. They aren't designed for trail walking. They look and feel good, so I'm happy with them. They are a little looser on the toe end than I expected, and I have pretty wide size 11 feet. These were the third pair of shoes I tried under the Prime Try before you buy feature, which includes free return shipping if you don't want to keep them. FILA won me over from New Balance, which I've worn for 10 years or more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and comfy
reviews.reviewText: I wear a medical AFO and this shoe was a good pairing for it. The first pair I wore for 2 years and my first night in the new set was nice 👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars poor tread durabiliyt
reviews.reviewText: tread wore out too quickly on smooth concrete surface

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars If you don't mind farting feet
reviews.reviewText: Bought these for my bf. Everytime he took a step it sounded as he was passing gas. I laughed and he wore them to work thinking that he needed to break them in. Let's just say everyone at his work was laughing when the realized it was his shoe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great work shoes
reviews.reviewText: I have used these shoes for over six years i get about 8-9 months out of a pair before replacing always fit well super comfortable. And great on wet floors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Hard to find 16 regular or narrow shoes. I am on my third pair but wear these daily. I am constantly walking or squating on my job and these have always performed well. I normally will wear a pair for six months and buy a new pair and use the old pair when I work the garden or on my vehicles. I can usually stretch the pair out to about a year of wear by rotating them, one for business work, and one for around the house work.

Llevo 2 años con los míos, los compré para hacer tareas del hogar donde se ensuciaran principalmente para uso rudo, resultaron ser muy comodos por dentro. También los he utilizado para hikes y me han servido de maravilla, la suela no se resbala incluso aunque pises piedras mojadas, es bastante rigida puedes pisar piedras o bordes sin que se deformen, te dan buena estabilidad. La plantilla que traen se deshizo la primera vez que los moje (se sumergieron por completo y camine 3km asi con ellos), obvio no son para eso pero se las cambie por plantillas de gel y me funcionaron excelente para un hike acuatico. Dureaderos y confiables.
This is my first pair of FILA shoes, and I was wondering about their quality. All my doubts were away when I began to use them. They are extremely comfy with very good quality. Totally recommendable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: Very comfortable, good quality, exactly as described.
reviews.reviewText: Very comfortable, good quality, exactly as described, prompt delivery from UK to Ireland. I Would buy from this Seller again.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excelente modelo. Súper cómodos y demasiado resistentes ❤️💪🏽
reviews.reviewText: Fila es una gran marca en tenis. Sin duda sus modelos muestra calidad, tengo aproximadamente 9 meses con esos pares y a decir verdad no han tenido ningún rasguño ni daño por el uso.Sin demasiados cómodos, súper resistentes y no pierden la forma.Si eres amante de los tenis, debes de probar la marca fila. Yo dejé de usar por un tiempo los modelos de Fila, pero este estilo en color negro, lo adquirí para llevarlos al trabajo y estar más cómodo, sin embargo, terminé usándolos para toda ocasión jajaj a tal grado que hoy volví a comprar unos, y lo mejor es que casi al mismo precio, solo varió unos 80 pesos más.Sin duda no te arrepentirás.OJO: compra media talla más grande, porque vienen ajustados, yo los compro exactos de mi talla (7 Mx) y no tuve problemas, pero a decir verdad me hubiera gustado tener medio número más para mayor comodidad, ya que entre mas esté el calzado, más calor tiende a generar.Les anexo fotos después de 9 meses de uso rudo.(Obviamente con su cuidado y lavado cada semana)
